name: KantCon 2011 Pre-Pre-Registration
blurb: KantCon is a gaming convention for tabletop hobby gamers in the Kansas City area, created by tabletop hobby gamers in Kansas City area.

rewards.reward: A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums.
A one day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, or Sunday of the convention. A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 5 raffle tickets (a $5 value).

A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 10 raffle tickets (a $10 value).

The custom Pre-Pre-Registration D6, exclusively available through Pre-Pre-Registration and no where else!  It's a custom six-sided die printed up by the folks over at The DiceCreatorsBlog.  You'll get a personalized profile on who you are and your gaming history on the Gamer's Haven Podcast. We'll even tell everyone about your favorite character if you want!  A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 30 raffle tickets (a $30 value).

The custom Pre-Pre-Registration D6, exclusively available through Pre-Pre-Registration and no where else!  It's a custom six-sided die printed up by the folks over at The DiceCreatorsBlog.  We'll have you guest on the Gamer's Haven Podcast and talk to you about your gaming life right on the show!  A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  An exclusive 15 oz. glass beer mug designed exclusively for KantCon 2011!  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 60 raffle tickets (a $60 value).

Our resident dice bag creator, Angela, will be making a custom, hand-made miniature dice bag, and we'll even through some random dice in 'em for you.  These bags are very nice!  During the KantCon Awards ceremony on Sunday, July 10, you will be presented with a special award for your dedication and pledge to KantCon 2011.  The custom Pre-Pre-Registration D6, exclusively available through Pre-Pre-Registration and no where else!  It's a custom six-sided die printed up by the folks over at The DiceCreatorsBlog.  A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  An exclusive 15 oz. glass beer mug designed exclusively for KantCon 2011!  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 80 raffle tickets (a $80 value).

Our resident dice bag creator, Angela, will be making a custom, hand-made medium-sized dice bag, and we'll even throw some random dice in it for you.  These bags are very nice!  During the KantCon Awards ceremony on Sunday, July 10, you will be presented with a special award for your dedication and pledge to KantCon 2011.  The custom Pre-Pre-Registration D6, exclusively available through Pre-Pre-Registration and no where else!  It's a custom six-sided die printed up by the folks over at The DiceCreatorsBlog.  A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  An exclusive 15 oz. glass beer mug designed exclusively for KantCon 2011!  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 100 raffle tickets (a $100 value).

You'll get a custom KantCon event for you.  Name a game, and we'll  make an event for it, with a special spot reserved just for you!  Our resident dice bag creator, Angela, will be making a custom, hand-made large-sized dice bag, and we'll even throw some random dice in it for you.  These bags are very nice!  During the KantCon Awards ceremony on Sunday, July 10, you will be presented with a special award for your dedication and pledge to KantCon 2011.  The custom Pre-Pre-Registration D6, exclusively available through Pre-Pre-Registration and no where else!  It's a custom six-sided die printed up by the folks over at The DiceCreatorsBlog.  A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  An exclusive 15 oz. glass beer mug designed exclusively for KantCon 2011!  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 150 raffle tickets (a $150 value).  You will also get a personal interview with the Gamer's Haven Podcast host Ethan to be aired on the show. Talk about what makes you a gaming geek.

Finally, our Road Warrior from last year, Tracy, will be putting his own skin on the line, and you get to choose his next tattoo.  As Tracy is going into teaching, there are some restrictions, of course, but he's a good sport.  The tattoo will be put on his body sometime in the year between KantCon 2011 and KantCon 2012.  The purchaser of the tier will pick the tattoo but Tracy will pick the size and location of said tattoo.  The tattoo must be something related to tabletop RPGs. Tracy will be funding the tattoo but if the purchaser of the tier wishes to contribute, it would not be unwelcome.  Our resident dice bag creator, Angela, will be making a custom, hand-made large-sized dice bag, and we'll even throw some random dice in it for you.  These bags are very nice!  During the KantCon Awards ceremony on Sunday, July 10, you will be presented with a special award for your dedication and pledge to KantCon 2011. A three-day pass to KantCon 2011, usable on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the convention. - A shout out on the Gamer's Haven Podcast itself.  An exclusive 15 oz. glass beer mug designed exclusively for KantCon 2011!  A personalized forum title on The Gamer's Haven Podcast Forums. You also get 300 raffle tickets (a $300 value).  You will also get a personal interview with the Gamer's Haven Podcast host Ethan to be aired on the show. Talk about what makes you a gaming geek.
